channel.title: Devxp on Ogenki
channel.description: Recent content in Devxp on Ogenki

item.title: `Dagger`: The missing piece of the developer experience?
item.description: Explore how Dagger can improve automation and streamline your development pipelines. Learn about an effective cache sharing proposal using Self-Hosted GitHub Actions and EKS.

item.title: Going Further with `Crossplane`: Compositions and Functions
item.description: Applying advanced Crossplane concepts in a practical example, particularly through the use of **`Composition functions`**, which might be the missing piece we've been waiting for...

item.title: 100% `GitOps` using Flux
item.description: Create and update cloud resources and applications with **Flux**
